p: Terpenoids are the class with more structural diversity among halophytic grasses summing 48 compounds distributed in several subclasses: triterpenoids ( 167– 180), sesquiterpenoids ( 181– 189), steroids and derivatives ( 190– 209), diterpenoids ( 216), monoterpenoids ( 211– 215) and tetraterpenoids ( 210) ( Table S1).
